revised_title: Observations of a Meteor at Peckham in 1741
tldr: In December 1741, a meteor was observed at Peckham by Thomas Milner. The meteor appeared as a bright globe that moved across the sky and then vanished. A narrow luminous streak remained after the globe disappeared, allowing for an estimation of its elevation. The phenomenon resembled a long, bright cloud and provided an opportunity for further astronomical observations.
